channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023080516
item.description:
Report X-2023080516

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered during the unload to be wet. Package Handler notified management and damaged hazmat procedure was begun. Package was placed in disposal tote for processing. DescribePack: Inner cap on bottle was loose and leaked material. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in salvage tote
